channel.title: Adding attack animations to custom weapons?
channel.description: Title says all. I just need to know how I can make it so custom weapons I add won't disappear when I attack with them. Thanks.

item.title: Adding attack animations to custom weapons?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

Find (ctrl+f)

public int GetWepAnim(int id)

Under it add

if(id == ####)//item name { return ####; }

Item ID
Animation ID
The item’s Name (You dont need this, but it is handy)

Read full topic
item.source: Adding attack animations to custom weapons?
